game.name: Papa’s Cheeseria
game.description:
Known as the 11th game of the Papa Louie restaurant management series, Papa?Cheeseria has a lot to offer to cooking game lovers.?

The opening celebration of Papa?Cheeseria is going to be held in the presence of popular and high-energy band ? Scarlett and Shakers. The bad news is that somebody has stolen all their music gear and due to this reason the show has been canceled. A good amount of cash is required to purchase their hugely expensive equipment. The good news is that you have been hired to prepare and serve the best quality and gigantic Grilled Cheese sandwiches at Papa?Cheeseria.

When you get engaged in this latest flash game, the responsibility of taking orders from the loyal customers of this restaurant is given to you. Reach the Build Station and start stacking up the sandwiches with the help of an exclusive variety of toppings, bread and cheese. Now turn to the Grill Station and cook the Grilled Cheese to perfect it to the max.?

At the Fry Station, you can cook french fries fast to add them to your favorite? Grilled Cheese sandwiches. Your patiently waiting customer is waiting for the final order that is equipped with Grilled Cheese and fries along with toppings. In this online flash game for girls, there are several unique special recipes. With the points you can collect through quality serving, you can help your customers enjoy Daily Specials. You would also be awarded the extra bonus for serving special dishes and having command over each of the 40 Special Recipes.
